name.en: Mali Chamber of Commerce and Industry
name.local: Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie du Mali

description.en:
The Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Mali (CCIM) was created in 1906. It's current status as a public institution is based in law 98-014/P-RM of 1998. 

The Chamber of Commerce provides assistance for the creation of companies, and maintains data on business creation.
